thread.title: Bannon Embarasses, Humiliates Media in Interview… Tells Them “You Have No Power”
thread.title_full: Bannon Embarasses, Humiliates Media in Interview… Tells Them “You Have No Power”

author: Gabrielle Cintorino
title: Bannon Embarasses, Humiliates Media in Interview… Tells Them “You Have No Power”
text: Trump Manhandles Reporter… Leaves Him in Epic Retreat, “I… I Don’t Want to …” “I want you to quote this,” Bannon said. “The media here is the opposition party. They don’t understand this country. They still do not understand why Donald Trump is the president of the United States.” It’s no secret that the mainstream media overwhelmingly expected a Clinton victory, even though Trump-supporting writers and websites repeatedly warned that polls predicting a Clinton victory were going to end up mistaken. “The elite media got it dead wrong, 100 percent dead wrong,” Bannon said, describing Trump’s win for the media as “a humiliating defeat that they will never wash away, that will always be there.” Advertisement - story continues below And the way news organizations have reacted — especially to revelations from the WikiLeaks email releases that American reporters were often working hand-in-glove with the Clinton campaign — shows little is likely to change, Bannon said. “The mainstream media has not fired or terminated anyone associated with following our campaign,” Bannon said. “Look at the Twitter feeds of these people. They were outright activists of the Clinton campaign.” And the American people are onto it, he said. “That’s why you have no power , you were humiliated,” Bannon said.
